title: Singapore resident population as of June 2018 by ethnic group
summary: In 2018 , Chinese thousands accounted for the largest thousands of Singapore population ethnic Others , with a 2969.28 thousands .
535.82 thousands of the company population Others was made through Malays thousands that year .
Malays thousands setting the pace strong growth of Singapore population Malays segment – rising seven thousands since 2012 – has contributed towards the falling thousands of its Chinese Ethnicity .
gold: As of June 2017 , the population of Singaporeans who were ethnic Chinese was around 2.97 million.
Singapore is a multi-ethnic and multi-religious society , with residents categorized into four main ethnic groups : Chinese , Malay , Indian , and Other ethnicities .
